discourse_list.title: Council of Prague: Trust & Reputation Ring - Session 1 Meeting Notes

content.content: Here are the notes from Monday’s session in the Philosopher’s Corner… And the names of those who offered to make sub-rings per the following breakout topics: Dispute Resolution - Dean & Mark  Types of Reputation - Daniel & Blake Forgiveness - Chaals Reputation Aggregation - Michael & Morgan Ethereum Ecosystem / Contextual Trust -- Chelsea

Here’s the thread for “Types of Reputation”:     CoP Trust & Reputation Sub-Ring: Types of Reputation Working Groups       Hi all,  Here is the kickoff thread for the “Types of Reputation” sub-ring of Trust & Reputation.  To seed discussion, I want to share an essay introducing some of the uses and risks of reputation systems, and describes ways to mitigate the risk by deployed appropriate types of reputation systems to various contexts. Please read and provide feedback!  https://hackernoon.com/reputation-systems-promise-and-peril-ae0af60595ea  If anyone else has resources, please share and discuss!
Here’s the start of what might become a thread on forgiveness in reputation systems
